par_segtext: aar mo ni ga lta bu'i rdo leb la rta
thul la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams dang
/ 'phags pa byams pa dang /
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang; lag na
rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che dpag tu
med pas brgyan pa rnams dang /
mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po dang /
sred med kyi bu dang /
dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams dang /
lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /

pa'i bsod nams bskyed par 'gyur te /
